Question: They co-starred in Unforgiven, and had a daughter, Francesca Fisher-this person (born August 7, 1993).
Hints: Richard Burton played the squad's commander, with this person as his right-hand man.
Kelly's Heroes was the last film in which this person appeared, that was not produced by his own Malpaso Productions.
In 1996, minutes before a jury was to render a verdict in Locke's favor, this person agreed to settle for an undisclosed amount.
